results.p: Who We Are. We are a small studio who like to harness technology to make creative, innovative, ambitious and artistic games. More about us ...
Hello Games Ltd is a British video game company based in Guildford, Surrey. The company was founded by Sean Murray, Grant Duncan, Ryan Doyle and David Ream ...
Hello Games is a bright little indie developer based in the UK! We made No Man's Sky and Joe Danger and want to bring rainbow tears of joy to the world.
We're dedicated to the craft of creating games that will make you cry joyful rainbow tears. Currently working on @NoMansSky!
A game about adventure, building, survival and exploration together. Set on a fantasy planet the size of Earth.
